description:
"Special Music Pack Vol. 4" is a collection of arranged music selected by the development team that is fun to play with Spell Bubble!
The new artist added to this set is C-CRAYS and Karento!!

This pack contains the following:

■6 Music
・Sound!CHIREI MY WAY! / Shinra-Bansho
・Dark Flight Dreamer / REDALiCE feat. Ayumi Nomiya
・Shiny Up! / C-CLAYS
・Haruzora Hallelujah / Girls Logic Observatory
・Konya, Shoujo Ja Irarenai / TaNaBaTa
・Love Suspense of the Moon and Madness / Karento

■6 challenge stages total.
・Lv.4:Shine brightly(Shiny Up!)
・Lv.6:I Can't Stop Loving It.(Love Suspense of the Moon and Madness)
・Lv.7:I Admire Cirno Pro.(Sound!CHIREI MY WAY!)
・Lv.8:Happy to Win, Disappointed to Lose(Konya, Shoujo Ja Irarenai)
・Lv.9:We Finally Got Her!(Dark Flight Dreamer)
・Lv.10:Yuyuko-Sama, It's Springtime.(Haruzora Hallelujah)

* Internet connection required for purchase.
* Game must be restarted after songs are purchased in order to use them.
name: Special Music Pack Vol. 4
